Name: Ame ni shite hito wo hazure
About the game: A visual novel about a mysterious senior and a suspicious case Mysterious senpai. A murder case that is making the rounds. And a giant fish shadow swimming at your feet....... What if all of them are connected to one another and surround me like a circle? What should I do? ◆Outline Genre : Visual Novel Play time : about 60 minutes Ending : 2 endings + extra ◆Staff Scenario : Tsubakichi Illustration : Kato, Miruku Music : Aioi Aoha Movie : Hayu, Ashinai Apoda Logo/UI/WEB design：Kuroanzu Script : Toritsukiyarou, Kuroanzu Director : Pilumu, Lamp Production : D10RAMA
